rows.title: User Agreement
This App Does Not Provide Medical Advice or Care

title.eng: This App Does Not Provide Medical Advice or Care

rows.title: Children’s Privacy

text.eng: @global.app_name isn’t meant for children under 18, and we do not knowingly gather personal details from users directly in this age group.

rows.text: @global.app_name isn’t meant for children under 18, and we do not knowingly gather personal details from users directly in this age group.

rows.title: Rules of Usage

text.eng:
@global.app_name is open-source, meaning its codebase is available on GitHub for the wider software development community. However, altering the existing application or its materials, or replicating any trademarks associated with the @global.app_name team, is against the terms of use. While the app is open-source, translating the software into other languages or creating alternative versions without properly crediting the @global.app_name team is not permitted. Unauthorised access to confidential user data is strictly prohibited.

When using the app, we believe you to be providing accurate information about yourself, avoid making false claims of affiliation, and accurately report the app's behaviour. Your use of the app must comply with all relevant local rules and regulations. By accessing and using the app, you confirm that you are not considered a minor in your country of residence.

rows.title: Content Changes

text.eng:
The @global.app_name team is committed to ensuring that the app is as useful and user friendly as possible. For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the app which will be delivered through updates. At present the app is free of charge and our intention is for it to stay that way.

In the future it is possible that some services may be offered that would incur a cost. We will never charge you for the app or its services without clearly making known to you first any access charges applicable.

rows.title: Intellectual property

text.eng: The app, together with its trademarks, copyright, database rights, and all associated intellectual property, is owned by or licensed to the various collaborators of the @global.app_name team. The software code is governed by the GPL 3 licence, while the content is covered under the Creative Commons International 4.0 license. The names, emblems, and logos of collaborating institutions are the exclusive property of those institutions and are protected under both national and international laws. Any unauthorised use is strictly prohibited. Reproducing or copying these logos in any form is not permitted without the prior written consent of the respective institution.

rows.title: Feedback Submissions

text.eng: Your feedback on the app is appreciated. So that we can improve, any comments are not considered confidential and will become available for further lawful use without additional approval or compensation. We shall therefore own exclusive rights and believe any feedback that you have made is original by you.

rows.title: Security

text.eng:
Our app stores and processes personal data that you have provided to us, in order to offer our services. It is your responsibility to keep your phone and access to the app secure. Removal of software restrictions and limitations imposed by the official operating system of your device is therefore not recommended. Doing so could make your phone vulnerable to malware, viruses, malicious programs as well as compromise your phone’s security features and could mean that the app will not work properly or at all.

To see how we handle your personal information, please refer to our @global.privacy_policy.

rows.title: External links and resources

text.eng:
The app uses third party services that declare their own @global.terms_and_conditions and may link to other websites and resources that are not under the app's control.

Links to @global.terms_and_conditions of third party service providers used by the app include:
-   [Google Play Services](https://policies.google.com/terms)
-   [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/terms/analytics)
-   [Matomo](https://matomo.org/matomo-cloud-terms-of-service/)
-   [Supabase](https://supabase.com/terms)

The inclusion of such links does not imply an endorsement or approval by the app and/or its partners of any website, product, or service. Similarly, the app and the @global.app_name team affiliated developers and collaborators do not assume any responsibility or liability in respect of such websites, product, or service, including, for example, responsibility or liability for the accuracy or reliability of any information, data, opinions, advice or statements made on those web sites.

rows.title: Disclaimer

text.eng:
Please be aware that the @global.app_name team exclude responsibility for the following:

1. Internet connections required: Certain functions of the app will require the app to have an active internet connection. The @global.app_name team cannot take responsibility for the app not working at full functionality if you do not have access to Wi-Fi, or you do not have any of your data allowance left.

2. Mobile network charges: Using the app outside of an area with Wi-Fi, will mean that your terms of agreement with your mobile network provider will still apply. As a result, you may be charged by your mobile provider for the cost of data for the duration of the connection while accessing the app, or other third party charges. In using the app, you accept responsibility for any such charges, including roaming data charges if you use the app outside of your home territory (i.e. region or country) without turning off data roaming. If you are not the bill payer for the device on which you are using the app, please be aware that we assume that you have received permission from the bill payer for using the app.

3. Third-party information: Although we endeavour to ensure that the app is updated and its content accurate, we do rely on third parties to provide information to us so that we can make it available to you. We do not regularly review all of the external sites and cannot guarantee that they are always accurate or reliable.

4. Limitation of liability: The @global.app_name team accepts no liability for any damage or loss, direct or indirect, you experience as a result of using the app, or arising from any reliance you may place on advice or information provided from the app. You should always exercise your own discretion and judgement appropriate to your own circumstances in relation to any advice or information provided from the app.

5. Viruses and bugs: Any instances of software bugs, viruses or other malicious material transmitted by a third party through our site are a regret, but we are devoid of responsibility.

6. App updates: The app is regularly updated to improve performance and content. The system requirements for the app may change over time, depending on the platform you use (and any additional platforms we may support in the future). It is your responsibility to download updates to continue using the app. The @global.app_name team does not guarantee that the app will always be updated to remain compatible with your device’s operating system. However, you agree to accept any updates to the app when they are offered to you.

7. Availability and termination: The app site might not be available at all times for reasons of maintenance or trouble with associated software or hardware. Whilst we apologise for inconveniences, we are not liable for any loss you may incur should the site not be accessible or is withdrawn. Equally, we have the right and choice to terminate your access and use of the app (including availability of captured data) at any time, without warning. Unless we tell you otherwise, upon any termination, (a) the rights and licences granted to you in these terms will end; (b) you must stop using the app, and (if needed) delete it from your device.

8. Indemnification: You agree to protect and indemnify @global.app_name, along with its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers, from any claims, actions, demands, liabilities, or settlements, including reasonable legal and accounting costs, arising from or alleged to arise from your breach of these @global.terms_and_conditions.

9. No endorsement: Companies or products associated with the app should not be interpreted as endorsement by the app or the @global.app_name team or demonstrate an intention to infringe proprietary rights.

rows.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction

text.eng:
You agree that any dispute with @global.app_name, or related to your use of the App, will be handled exclusively by the courts in the State of Kuwait. You also agree to allow the courts in Kuwait to have authority over you for any such dispute, including claims involving @global.app_name, its affiliates, subsidiaries, employees, contractors, officers, directors, and any associated service or content providers.

These @global.terms_and_conditions are governed by the laws and regulations of the State of Kuwait, without taking into account any conflict of laws principles. If any part of these @global.terms_and_conditions is found to be invalid by a court, the remaining terms will still apply. No waiver of these @global.terms_and_conditions will be considered a continuing waiver of that term or any other term.

rows.title: Changes to the @global.terms_and_conditions

text.eng: We may update our @global.terms_and_conditions from time to time. You waive your right to be notified directly of changes and are advised to review this page periodically for any updates. Your continued use of the app suggests you agree to subsequent revisions of the @global.terms_and_conditions.
